title: JAM Session _117 Creating a Transcript Evaluation Workflow for Admissions and Registrar.pdf
docSource: pdf file uploaded by the user.
pageContent: © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  Presented by Larry D. Arrington, Jr.  & Patrick McElhaney  Shorter University  May 28, 2015  Session #117 Creating a Transcript Evaluation Workflow that Works for Admissions & the Registrar’s Office  Jenzabar’s Annual Meeting  May 27 - 30, 2015 Gaylord Opryland Resort & Convention Center  Nashville, TN © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.     Founded 1873 in Rome, GA     Approx. 2,250 Students     Traditional, Online, and Adult Degree Programs     40 Academic Majors     21 Athletic Teams * Member of NCAA Division II  SHORTER UNIVERSITY  TRANSFORMING LIVES THROUGH CHRIST © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.     Find a process that worked well for admissions and the registrar’s office     Speed up evaluation of transcripts     Security     Utilize paperless work flow  Mission: Seemed Impossible © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  The beginning of a solution... © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.     We didn’t have the document imaging system from the presentation.     Something new to us  Road Blocks © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.     Utilize Transfer Evaluation System (TES)     Utilize our document imaging system- Image Freeway     Utilize Notepad     Utilize To Do list     Utilize Jenzabar more  Solutions © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  Create Your Actions 1. Evaluation to be Completed © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  2. Transcript Evaluation Completed © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  Notepad Plays an Important Role © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  Pull the Action over to notify evaluator © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.     This allows evaluator to know transcripts have been received, and are ready for evaluation.     Also allows evaluator to prioritize evaluations on To Do list. © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  To Do List View © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  Evaluator clicks  check box as  completed once  the evaluation is  completed. © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  Evaluator then pulls in Evaluation Completed action. This notifies Admissions that evaluation has been completed. © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  Check box marked as completed once Admissions notifies student that evaluation is completed and ready. © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc. © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  Larry D. Arrington, Jr.  Associate Registrar  Shorter University  Rome, GA  Larrington@shorter.edu  Patrick McElhaney  Director of Admissions  Shorter University  Rome, GA  Pmcelhaney@shorter.edu  Contact Information © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  Thank You for Attending Session #117  Hope you have many Ah-Ha moments at JAM 2015!
